Container.Name: tauticord
Container.Overview: Tauticord is a Discord bot that displays live data from Tautulli, including stream summaries, bandwidth and library statistics.
Container.Requires: Please see announcements for potential breaking changes: https://github.com/nwithan8/tauticord/blob/master/documentation/ANNOUNCEMENTS.md
Container.Changes:
### 2024-03-25 - BREAKING CHANGE
Template now uses dropdowns for boolean values. Please see the [GitHub page](https://github.com/nwithan8/tauticord/blob/master/documentation/ANNOUNCEMENTS.md#adding-dropdown-options-in-unraid-community-applications-template) for more information.
